markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.0**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/back-end-development/net-class-libraries-of-platform-core)** (8.3).

Version: 8.0

Level: advanced

The documentation for the server-side classes of platform kernel (.NET Core API) is available on the separate web-resource <https://academy.creatio.com/api/netcoreapi/7.17.0/index.html>
